casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Douglas W. STANDARD 309P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Douglas Wayne Standard, for Standard, Douglas W. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of September 2018 by Defendant for Trial by Jury:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
